name: Enterprise Integration
shortDescription: Point-to-point connections between the systems to be integrated.
description: Today there are several challenges and opportunities to connect people and systems and processes that are important and valuable for us. So that we can choose the right integration techniques.
subtitle: Point-to-point Integration

mainTexts.text: Point-to-point integration between integrating systems is a traditional solution for integration requirements that is still used today.

The advantage of such direct connections is that they can be created easily and quickly when needed. but as a disadvantage, scalability is poorly. With point-to-point connections, the complexity of the overall system increases exponentially with each additional individual connection (spaghetti integration dilemma).

paragraphs.text: combine both worlds, would it be more exciting and possible?:

benefits.text: Connectivity for the most diverse endpoints
Support for all required integration types
You always have full control and transparency

name: Custom Development
shortDescription: Individual tailor-made software solutions that integrate seamlessly.
description: There are no redundancies in our individual software developments. We get the necessary data for processing in our solutions.
subtitle: Your Individual Solution

mainTexts.text: A mission-critical application is no longer an isolated solution. It must also integrate seamlessly with a company's systems and processes. By working or participating in various development and integration projects, Wesner Software Development has deepened the company's competencies. The company thus has an understanding of the development of processes in large and medium-sized companies.

paragraphs.text: for central applications with business-critical tasks and high demands on performance, mass data processing and process efficiency.
to existing systems, so that there is really added value.

benefits.text: Based on the latest Microsoft technologies

description: We offer tailor-made solutions for your support needs - all with one goal, to ensure the smooth operation of your BizTalk and Azure integration applications.
subtitle: Play it safe with our support
